name: Magnemite
flavorText:
Uses anti-gravity
to stay suspended.
Appears without warning and uses
THUNDER WAVE and
similar moves.

previous.name: Slowbro
previous.flavorText:
The SHELLDER that
is latched onto
SLOWPOKE's tail is said to feed
on the host's left
over scraps.

next.name: Magneton
next.flavorText:
Formed by several
MAGNEMITEs linked
together. They frequently appear
when sunspots
flare up.

pokemon.name: Magnezone
pokemon.flavorText:
It evolved from exposure to a
special magnetic field.
Three units generate magnetism.
